name: LazWatchDog
short_description:
v.2.1.1.26 
- Added ability to enable/disable separately procStarter or CpuMem monitor.
-Bugfix where CPU was not reported even if exceeded the value

v.2.0.0.23 - A small bugfix in Add To whitelist

Currently it has two features:
1. A windows utility to start processes/applications in certain intervals, if they are not running
2. Checks for CPU and MEM usage for certain values (values defined by user), and if they exceed, you'll get a notification to perform action: terminate,add to whitelist. Optionally you can check AutoKill for both, CPU and MEM usage.
summary: A windows utility for processes (autostart proc,cpu/mem monitor)
